file_content.text: Looking to trade? Not much, but I need some creds.
Anything that'll bring my crop back. Not much I can do about debris all over my land.
This planet's gone to pot since the Empire arrived. No food, no law, scavengers everywhere....
Yesterday, I had to buy off some Mandalorians. Mandalorians, here!
Start carrying a blaster, friend. We're caught in a war, and it won't end soon.
